00031 void TurtleMobility::initialize(int stage)
00032 {
00033     LineSegmentsMobilityBase::initialize(stage);
00034 
00035     EV << "initializing TurtleMobility stage " << stage << endl;
00036 
00037     if(stage == 0)
00038     {
00039         turtleScript = par("turtleScript");
00040         nextStatement = turtleScript->getFirstChild();
00041 
00042         move.speed = 1;
00043         angle = 0;
00044         borderPolicy = REFLECT;
00045 
00046         // a dirty trick to extract starting position out of the script
00047         // (start doing it, but then rewind to the beginning)
00048 
00049   // does not really work
00050   // we need to  set the startPos initially for which there is no option in
00051   // turtlemobility
00052   // -> always starting with random position... (Daniel)
00053         //resumeScript();
00054         //nextStatement = turtleScript->getFirstChild();
00055         //while (!loopVars.empty()) loopVars.pop();
00056 
00057         WATCH(move.speed);
00058         WATCH(angle);
00059         WATCH(borderPolicy);
00060     }
00061     else if(stage == 1){
00062   targetPos = move.startPos;
00063   stepTarget = move.startPos;
00064   targetTime = simTime();
00065     }
00066 }
00067 
00068 void TurtleMobility::setTargetPosition()
00069 {
00070     resumeScript();
00071 
00072     move.startTime = simTime();
00073 }

00075 void TurtleMobility::fixIfHostGetsOutside()
00076 {
00077     EV << "stepTarget: " << stepTarget.info() << " targetPos: " << targetPos.info() << " stepSize: " << stepSize.info()
00078        << " angle: " << angle << endl;
00079 
00080     if( handleIfOutside(borderPolicy, stepTarget, targetPos, stepSize, angle) ){
00081 
00082   EV << "stepTarget: " << stepTarget.info() << " targetPos: " << targetPos.info() << " stepSize: " << stepSize.info()
00083      << " angle: " << angle << endl;
00084 
00085     }
00086 }

00091 void TurtleMobility::resumeScript()
00092 {
00093     if (!nextStatement)
00094     {
00095   move.speed = 0;
00096   EV << "no statement found -> not moving!\n";
00097         return;
00098     }
00099 
00100     simtime_t now = targetTime;
00101 
00102     // interpret statement
00103     while (nextStatement && targetTime==now)
00104     {
00105         executeStatement(nextStatement);
00106         gotoNextStatement();
00107     }
00108 }
00109 
00110 void TurtleMobility::executeStatement(cXMLElement *stmt)
00111 {
00112     const char *tag = stmt->getTagName();
00113 
00114     EV << "doing <" << tag << ">\n";
00115 
00116     if (!strcmp(tag,"repeat"))
00117     {
00118         const char *nAttr = stmt->getAttribute("n");
00119         long n = -1;  // infinity -- that's the default
00120         if (nAttr)
00121         {
00122             n = (long) getValue(nAttr);
00123             if (n<0)
00124                 error("<repeat>: negative repeat count at %s", stmt->getSourceLocation());
00125         }
00126         loopVars.push(n);
00127     }
00128 
00129 
00130     else if (!strcmp(tag,"set"))
00131     {
00132         const char *speedAttr = stmt->getAttribute("speed");
00133         const char *angleAttr = stmt->getAttribute("angle");
00134         const char *xAttr = stmt->getAttribute("x");
00135         const char *yAttr = stmt->getAttribute("y");
00136         const char *bpAttr = stmt->getAttribute("borderPolicy");
00137         if (speedAttr)
00138             move.speed = getValue(speedAttr);
00139         if (angleAttr)
00140             angle = getValue(angleAttr);
00141         if (xAttr)
00142             targetPos.setX(getValue(xAttr));
00143         if (yAttr)
00144             targetPos.setY(getValue(yAttr));
00145         if (move.speed<=0)
00146             error("<set>: speed is negative or zero at %s", stmt->getSourceLocation());
00147         if (bpAttr)
00148         {
00149             if (!strcmp(bpAttr,"reflect"))
00150                 borderPolicy = REFLECT;
00151             else if (!strcmp(bpAttr,"wrap"))
00152                 borderPolicy = WRAP;
00153             else if (!strcmp(bpAttr,"placerandomly"))
00154                 borderPolicy = PLACERANDOMLY;
00155 
00156             else if (!strcmp(bpAttr,"error"))
00157                 borderPolicy = RAISEERROR;
00158             else
00159                 error("<set>: value for attribute borderPolicy is invalid, should be "
00160                       "'reflect', 'wrap', 'placerandomly' or 'error' at %s",
00161                       stmt->getSourceLocation());
00162         }
00163     }
00164     else if (!strcmp(tag,"forward"))
00165     {
00166         const char *dAttr = stmt->getAttribute("d");
00167         const char *tAttr = stmt->getAttribute("t");
00168         if (!dAttr && !tAttr)
00169             error("<forward>: must have at least attribute 't' or 'd' (or both) at %s", stmt->getSourceLocation());
00170         double d, t;
00171         if (tAttr && dAttr)
00172         {
00173             // cover distance d in time t (current speed is ignored)
00174             d = getValue(dAttr);
00175             t = getValue(tAttr);
00176         }
00177         else if (dAttr)
00178         {
00179             // travel distance d at current speed
00180             d = getValue(dAttr);
00181             t = d / move.speed;
00182         }
00183         else // tAttr only
00184         {
00185             // travel for time t at current speed
00186             t = getValue(tAttr);
00187             d = move.speed * t;
00188         }
00189         if (t<0)
00190             error("<forward>: time (attribute t) is negative at %s", stmt->getSourceLocation());
00191         if (d<0)
00192             error("<forward>: distance (attribute d) is negative at %s", stmt->getSourceLocation());
00193         // FIXME handle zeros properly...
00194         targetPos.setX(targetPos.getX() + d * cos(PI * angle / 180));
00195         targetPos.setY(targetPos.getY() + d * sin(PI * angle / 180));
00196         targetTime += t;
00197     }
00198     else if (!strcmp(tag,"turn"))
00199     {
00200         const char *angleAttr = stmt->getAttribute("angle");
00201         if (!angleAttr)
00202             error("<turn>: required attribute 'angle' missing at %s", stmt->getSourceLocation());
00203         angle += getValue(angleAttr);
00204     }
00205     else if (!strcmp(tag,"wait"))
00206     {
00207         const char *tAttr = stmt->getAttribute("t");
00208         if (!tAttr)
00209             error("<wait>: required attribute 't' missing at %s", stmt->getSourceLocation());
00210         simtime_t t = getValue(tAttr);
00211         if (t<0)
00212             error("<wait>: time (attribute t) is negative (%s) at %s", SIMTIME_STR(t), stmt->getSourceLocation());
00213         targetTime += t;  // targetPos is unchanged
00214     }
00215     else if (!strcmp(tag,"moveto"))
00216     {
00217         const char *xAttr = stmt->getAttribute("x");
00218         const char *yAttr = stmt->getAttribute("y");
00219         const char *tAttr = stmt->getAttribute("t");
00220 
00221         if (xAttr)
00222             targetPos.setX(getValue(xAttr));
00223         if (yAttr)
00224             targetPos.setY(getValue(yAttr));
00225         // travel to targetPos at current speed, or get there in time t (ignoring current speed then)
00226         simtime_t t = tAttr ? getValue(tAttr) : move.startPos.distance(targetPos)/move.speed;
00227         if (t<0)
00228             error("<wait>: time (attribute t) is negative at %s", stmt->getSourceLocation());
00229         targetTime += t;
00230     }
00231     else if (!strcmp(tag,"moveby"))
00232     {
00233         const char *xAttr = stmt->getAttribute("x");
00234         const char *yAttr = stmt->getAttribute("y");
00235         const char *tAttr = stmt->getAttribute("t");
00236         if (xAttr)
00237             targetPos.setX(targetPos.getX() + getValue(xAttr));
00238         if (yAttr)
00239             targetPos.setY(targetPos.getY() + getValue(yAttr));
00240         // travel to targetPos at current speed, or get there in time t (ignoring current speed then)
00241         simtime_t t = tAttr ? getValue(tAttr) : move.startPos.distance(targetPos)/move.speed;
00242         if (t<0)
00243             error("<wait>: time (attribute t) is negative at %s", stmt->getSourceLocation());
00244         targetTime += t;
00245     }
00246 }
00247 
00248 double TurtleMobility::getValue(const char *s)
00249 {
00250     // first, textually replace $MAXX and $MAXY with their actual values
00251     std::string str;
00252     if (strchr(s,'$'))
00253     {
00254         char strMaxX[32], strMaxY[32];
00255         sprintf(strMaxX, "%g", playgroundSizeX()-1);
00256         sprintf(strMaxY, "%g", playgroundSizeY()-1);
00257 
00258         str = s;
00259         std::string::size_type pos;
00260         while ((pos = str.find("$MAXX")) != std::string::npos)
00261             str.replace(pos, sizeof("$MAXX")-1, strMaxX);
00262         while ((pos = str.find("$MAXY")) != std::string::npos)
00263             str.replace(pos, sizeof("$MAXY")-1, strMaxY);
00264         s = str.c_str();
00265     }
00266 
00267     // then use cMsgPar to evaluate the string
00268     cMsgPar tmp;
00269     if (!tmp.parse(s,'?'))
00270         error("wrong value '%s' around %s", s, nextStatement->getSourceLocation());
00271     return tmp.doubleValue();
00272 }
00273 
00274 void TurtleMobility::gotoNextStatement()
00275 {
00276     // "statement either doesn't have a child, or it's a <repeat> and loop count is already pushed on the stack"
00277     ASSERT(!nextStatement->getFirstChild() || (!strcmp(nextStatement->getTagName(),"repeat") && !loopVars.empty()));
00278 
00279     if (nextStatement->getFirstChild() && (loopVars.top()!=0 || (loopVars.pop(),false)))   // !=0: positive or -1
00280     {
00281         // statement must be a <repeat> if it has children; repeat count>0 must be
00282         // on the stack; let's start doing the body.
00283         nextStatement = nextStatement->getFirstChild();
00284     }
00285     else if (!nextStatement->getNextSibling())
00286     {
00287         // no sibling -- either end of <repeat> body, or end of script
00288         ASSERT(nextStatement->getParentNode()==turtleScript ? loopVars.empty() : !loopVars.empty());
00289         if (!loopVars.empty())
00290         {
00291             // decrement and check loop counter
00292             if (loopVars.top()!=-1)  // -1 means infinity
00293                 loopVars.top()--;
00294             if (loopVars.top()!=0)  // positive or -1
00295             {
00296                 // go to beginning of <repeat> block again
00297                 nextStatement = nextStatement->getParentNode()->getFirstChild();
00298             }
00299             else
00300             {
00301                 // end of loop -- locate next statement after the <repeat>
00302                 nextStatement = nextStatement->getParentNode();
00303                 gotoNextStatement();
00304             }
00305         }
00306         else
00307         {
00308             // end of script
00309             nextStatement = NULL;
00310         }
00311     }
00312     else
00313 
00314     {
00315         // go to next statement (must exist -- see "if" above)
00316         nextStatement = nextStatement->getNextSibling();
00317     }
00318 }
